name: Five Nights at Freddy's: Security Breach - Blast to the Past!
summary: The team behind Blast to the Past! is taking the vanilla game and reshaping it to become something great, something that fans were hoping for. Blast to the Past! is a mod that restores all cut content back to Security Breach and takes a step further by adding new content and new gameplay features and bits of story to help rekindle the spark that is Security Breach! Have a Faz-errific day and keep a look out for teasers and the future release!
